title: Game Scoop Episode 621
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing topics like the games they're excited for right now, how their gaming tastes have matured, the future of arcades, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
